bike.description: A2-SL custom-butted alloy w/ PowerCurve down tube, oversized seat tube. Rear triangle: A1-SL alloy w/ S-bend chainstays, post disc mount, cold-forged dropout and replaceable hanger
bike.paint_description: White w/ Green; Black w/ Red - Matte

components.description: SR Suntour SF13-XCM-HLO w/ hydraulic lockout, 100mm travel
FSA square taper w/ sealed cartridge bearing
Formula DC-20LW front / Shimano M475 rear, 32H disc hubs, Vera DPD22 rims
Hayes Dyno Sport, hydraulic disc, 180mm/160mm rotor
Oval M100, alloy riser bar, 9° sweep, 31.8mm diameter, 660mm wide, 15mm rise
Oval M213, 3D-forged alloy, 31.8mm clamp diameter, 6° rise
Oval M200 w/ satin steel rails
Oval M200, alloy double-bolt micro-adjust, 31.6mm x 350mm
